systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

classification.Description: The reason the incident was closed

classificationComment.Description: Describes the reason the incident was closed

classificationReason.Description: The classification reason the incident was closed with

createdTimeUtc.Description: The time the incident was created

firstActivityTimeUtc.Description: The time of the first activity in the incident

incidentUrl.Description: The deep-link url to the incident in Azure portal

labels.Description: List of labels relevant to this incident

lastActivityTimeUtc.Description: The time of the last activity in the incident

lastModifiedTimeUtc.Description: The last time the incident was updated

owner.Description: Describes a user that the incident is assigned to

relatedAnalyticRuleIds.Description: List of resource ids of Analytic rules related to the incident

alertsCount.Description: The number of alerts in the incident

bookmarksCount.Description: The number of bookmarks in the incident

commentsCount.Description: The number of comments in the incident

alertProductNames.Description: List of product names of alerts in the incident

email.Description: The email of the user the incident is assigned to.

assignedTo.Description: The name of the user the incident is assigned to.

objectId.Description: The object id of the user the incident is assigned to.

userPrincipalName.Description: The user principal name of the user the incident is assigned to.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdTimeUtc.Description: The time the comment was created

lastModifiedTimeUtc.Description: The time the comment was updated

author.Description: Describes the client that created the comment

objectId.Description: The object id of the client.

userPrincipalName.Description: The user principal name of the client.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

relatedResourceId.Description: The resource ID of the related resource

relatedResourceName.Description: The name of the related resource

relatedResourceType.Description: The resource type of the related resource

relatedResourceKind.Description: The resource kind of the related resource

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

watchlistId.Description: The id (a Guid) of the watchlist

displayName.Description: The display name of the watchlist

created.Description: The time the watchlist was created

updated.Description: The last time the watchlist was updated

createdBy.Description: Describes a user that created the watchlist

updatedBy.Description: Describes a user that updated the watchlist

isDeleted.Description: A flag that indicates if the watchlist is deleted or not

labels.Description: List of labels relevant to this watchlist

defaultDuration.Description: The default duration of a watchlist (in ISO 8601 duration format)

tenantId.Description: The tenantId where the watchlist belongs to

numberOfLinesToSkip.Description: The number of lines in a csv content to skip before the header

rawContent.Description:
The raw content that represents to watchlist items to create. Example : This line will be skipped
header1,header2
value1,value2

itemsSearchKey.Description: The search key is used to optimize query performance when using watchlists for joins with other data. For example, enable a column with IP addresses to be the designated SearchKey field, then use this field as the key field when joining to other event data by IP address.

contentType.Description: The content type of the raw content. For now, only text/csv is valid

uploadStatus.Description: The status of the Watchlist upload : New, InProgress or Complete. **Note** : When a Watchlist upload status is InProgress, the Watchlist cannot be deleted

objectId.Description: The object id of the user.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

watchlistItemType.Description: The type of the watchlist item

watchlistItemId.Description: The id (a Guid) of the watchlist item

tenantId.Description: The tenantId to which the watchlist item belongs to

isDeleted.Description: A flag that indicates if the watchlist item is deleted or not

created.Description: The time the watchlist item was created

updated.Description: The last time the watchlist item was updated

createdBy.Description: Describes a user that created the watchlist item

updatedBy.Description: Describes a user that updated the watchlist item

itemsKeyValue.Description: key-value pairs for a watchlist item

entityMapping.Description: key-value pairs for a watchlist item entity mapping

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

source.Description: Source of a threat intelligence entity

displayName.Description: Display name of a threat intelligence entity

description.Description: Description of a threat intelligence entity

indicatorTypes.Description: Indicator types of threat intelligence entities

pattern.Description: Pattern of a threat intelligence entity

patternType.Description: Pattern type of a threat intelligence entity

patternVersion.Description: Pattern version of a threat intelligence entity

externalId.Description: External ID of threat intelligence entity

createdByRef.Description: Created by reference of threat intelligence entity

externalLastUpdatedTimeUtc.Description: External last updated time in UTC

objectMarkingRefs.Description: Threat intelligence entity object marking references

additionalData.Description: A bag of custom fields that should be part of the entity and will be presented to the user.

friendlyName.Description: The graph item display name which is a short humanly readable description of the graph item instance. This property is optional and might be system generated.
